|Description=Pure hypercholesterolaemia, pure hypertriglyceridaemia, mixed hyperlipidaemia

|Order=2}}

* 3 main types of dyslipidemia:
** pure hypercholesterolaemia
** pure hypertriglyceridemia
** mixed hyperlipidaemia

* Hyperlipidaemia is distinguished according to its cause into primary hyperlipidaemia, secondary hyperlipidaemia (due to disease or medication) and dyslipidaemia associated with type 2 diabetes and metabolic syndrome.

question.title: What are the three main types of dyslipidemia?

option_a.title: Hypercholesterolaemia, Hypertriglyceridaemia, and Hyperlipidaemia
option_a.description: A combination of the three main types of dyslipidemia

option_b.title: Hypercholesterolaemia, Hypertriglyceridaemia, and Hyperlipidaemia (with additional conditions)
option_b.description: The three main types of dyslipidemia, plus other conditions that affect lipid levels

option_c.title: Primary Hyperlipidaemia, Secondary Hyperlipidaemia, and Mixed Hyperlipidaemia
option_c.description: Types of dyslipidaemia based on cause, not just lipid type

option_d.title: Hypercholesterolaemia, Hypertriglyceridaemia, and Mixed Hyperlipidaemia
option_d.description: A subset of the three main types of dyslipidemia

correct_option.title: a
correct_option.description: The first letter of the correct answer
